title: Reflex Watch Face Android Wear
summary: Watch Face Reflex from Switzerlandfor Moto360, LG G Watch R, Gearluxury clock
description: Android Wear Watch Face REFLEXNice sun reflexions on your watchface, looks like a premium Rolex, Rado or Breitling. Modern design for everyday usage - pure unisex luxury watch - the best watch on the app store for men & women. Simulates sun reflexion so it appears as a real watch like a Omega + nice animations! Round or Rectangle the Watch supports both. BurnIn protection for OLED screens Change settings on the watch or in the companion app.customization+ Now you can save up your battery with the ambient brightness setting!+ Show / Hide Date, Watch Name+ Reflexion Animation (with the sensors on your watch)+ Hand Animation (every tick is animated and looks gorgeous)compatible devices:Motorola Moto360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, Samsung Gear LIVE, SmartWatch 3, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony 3 Android wear watches The App will work with ANY smartwatch that runs Android Wear!install:After installing the app on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the watchLong press on the watchface clock, then select REFLEX or use the companion app.Suggestions to improve the watch? Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best.Currently our Android wear watchfaces app can be used on the Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony,  Moto 360 & ASUS Zenwatch, Samsung Gear Live, LG G and all other Android Wear devices. Premium luxary clock like Rolex Breitling Rado Pujie or Omega*designed in switzerland - swiss made*
descriptionHTML:
Android Wear Watch Face REFLEX
Nice sun reflexions on your watchface, looks like a premium Rolex, Rado or Breitling. Modern design for everyday usage - pure unisex luxury watch - the best watch on the app store for men & women. Simulates sun reflexion so it appears as a real watch like a Omega + nice animations! Round or Rectangle the Watch supports both. BurnIn protection for OLED screens Change settings on the watch or in the companion app.


customization
+ Now you can save up your battery with the ambient brightness setting!
+ Show / Hide Date, Watch Name
+ Reflexion Animation (with the sensors on your watch)
+ Hand Animation (every tick is animated and looks gorgeous)

compatible devices:
Motorola Moto360, LG G Watch, LG G WATCH R, Samsung Gear LIVE, SmartWatch 3, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony 3 Android wear watches
The App will work with ANY smartwatch that runs Android Wear!

install:
After installing the app on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the watch
Long press on the watchface clock, then select REFLEX or use the companion app.

Suggestions to improve the watch? Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best.


Currently our Android wear watchfaces app can be used on the Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony, Moto 360 & ASUS Zenwatch, Samsung Gear Live, LG G and all other Android Wear devices. Premium luxary clock like Rolex Breitling Rado Pujie or Omega
*designed in switzerland - swiss made*
comments: Great simple Watch face Too many are complex eye sores eating the watches battery.  I like that you can control the ambient screen brightness, be cool if you can change it by the time of day. Noon very bright, 10pm half brightness
Does not let me add to my Huawei. Watch it worked on there before I payed for this app and now it won't work help. My favorite watch face
Very nice. Animations are great. Doesn't need additional customisation in my opinion. I wouldn't worry about such requests. Leave it simple and stylish. Looking forward in seeing more from you guys
One Major Bug This is a great looking watch face. My only problem is that it flashes on/off when my Moto 360 is charging. No other watch face does this.

Great but issue when watch charging Really good watch face.  However, if I put Moto 360 on the charger, the charging clock face repeatedly flashes off and on.  To deal with this, I have to select an alternative watch face before placing on the charger.
Close to great but... My favourite 360 watch face with classy colours and animations. BUT watch flashes on and off constantly when on charge. 5 stars when fault fixed.
